lyrics:
13 contributorsbeer don’t lyricsverse 1
map dot southern rock buckshot stop sign
grizz pack mantle rack channel cat trot line
pipes aint bristol but theyre pretty loud though
round here the sun goes down slow
but beer dont

verse 2
home base thats the party spot at the walmart
second base in the parkin lot at the ballpark
sweet cherry pie slice in the boondocks
skillets and the engines and the women stay hot

chorus
but beer dont start nothin but the party
beer dont taste half as good in the city
beer dont buzz with that hiphop cuz
but it damn sure does with a little nitty gritty
beer dont bust its ass monday to friday
beer dont wanna sit in a glass so slide it my way
we might drink way too many of em at the bar
people got their own opinion about how redneck we are
but beer dont

verse 3
big boss on your back bout to get a cussout
scopes off low shot didnt lay the buck down
baby says bye and it down right breaks you
hey just remember when you think the world hates you
see morgan wallen liveget tickets as low as 22you might also likechorus
beer dont start nothin but the party
beer dont taste half as good in the city
beer dont buzz with that hiphop cuz
but it damn sure does with a little nitty gritty
beer dont bust its ass monday to friday
beer dont wanna sit in a glass so slide it my way
we might drink way too many of em at the bar
people got their own opinion about how redneck we are
but beer dont
no beer dont

bridge
one beer two beer three beer four
theres twenty more of em behind the fridge door
five beer six beer seven beer eight
you can keep count but ill tell you who aint

chorus
beer dont start nothin but the party
beer dont taste half as good in the city
beer dont buzz with that hiphop cuz
but it damn sure does with a little nitty gritty
